data.name: Ethereal Summit New York 2020
data.description: Ethereal Summit returns to New York on May 8-9, 2020. Discover what’s next in tech, blockchain, and decentralization.

relatedRecords.name: O’Reilly Software Architecture Conference
relatedRecords.description: Go deeper and broader on crucial topics such as microservices, serverless, leadership, and domain-driven design. Get the training you need to stay at the forefront of software architecture.

relatedRecords.name: Stir Trek
relatedRecords.description: Stir Trek is a one-day conference in Columbus, Ohio focused on teaching software developers the latest and greatest in technologies, techniques, and tools. The full day of content is always concluded with a private screening of a blockbuster film on its opening day.

relatedRecords.name: Global Azure Day - Milwaukee
relatedRecords.description:
All around the world user groups and communities want to learn about Azure and Cloud Computing!
